vsParam:
Wilbell, Wilbell!
Do you want to have some tea together?

I am going to the library to look up some books
on this world's wizardry.

I looked at the contents taught in class, but I didn't find
anything. Turns out you must find materials for free
assignment yourself!

She doesn't like being down-to-earth,
but she actively looks up books...
Hehe, it means Wilbell is growing up. Who knows what assignment will she find, I can't wait to see it.

This could do...
Ah, this seems good, too!

Wilbell, have you decided your assignment yet?
Uh, this... isn't it a biography of witches and wizards?

Er, yes. If I could reproduce the great work done by great
witches and wizards, that would be a perfect achievement!

All assignments I could think of are done by others,
isn't it a choice for me to refer to others' works?
I think it's a good idea!

Hmm, you don't get it!
How can this be plagiarism!

Hee hee.
How's that? I am smart, huh!

Although this has been done by others,
it still take efforts to reproduce it, right?

So, if I could reproduce them,
it's unquestionably my own achievement!

I can't tell if that's plagiarism or your own work
anymore, ah huh huh...
